posts.post_title: FS: Red Sox Team All 12 (SGC and Raw)
posts.post_content:
5 of the 12 are graded SGC, the others won't be sent off for a bit. Paypal F/F delivered. You can see the fronts at the link below, I will post the backs soon.
 
Kleinow (Boston) SGC 30 $90
Lord SGC 45 $60
Niles SGC 20 $28
Stahl no glove SGC 35 $35
Stahl with glove raw *sold*
Wagner bat on left shoulder SGC 30 $35
Wagner bat on right shoulder raw $33
Speaker raw *sold*
Arrellanes raw $30
Carrigan raw $34
Spencer raw *sold*
Cicotte raw (poss. trimmed) $65
